Text.Page:
Dakonan Junction's full of folks the federation needs to eliminate.

Take out {@LinkCreature:56#4#bleakbone dragoons}, devan {@LinkCreature:56#5#fateshapers}, {@LinkCreature:56#6#reapers}, {@LinkCreature:56#55#viziers}, and {@LinkCreature:56#56#reavers}, and Bleakrock {@LinkCreature:56#20#destroyers} and {@LinkCreature:56#22#shamans}.

Report to Ayshia at Dakonan Overwatch when you complete the mission.
Excellent! Take this as a reward from the federation for your hard work.
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
